name: Norma Jean
description:
'''Norma Jean''' (originally known as '''Luti-Kriss''') is an American [[metalcore]] band from [[Douglasville, Georgia]], a suburb of [[Atlanta, Georgia|Atlanta]]. Formed in 1997, the band has evolved through various lineup changes, resulting in no original members remaining. To date, Norma Jean has released nine studio albums and received a [[Grammy Award]] nomination in 2006 for [[Grammy Award for Best Recording Package|Best Recording Package]] for their second album ''[[O' God, the Aftermath]]''. The band's name is derived from the real name of actress [[Marilyn Monroe]]. The Idea being that the band was forced to change their name from Luti-Kriss, much like Marilyn herself was "forced".
{{toc limit|3}}
